summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5993 for the improvement of 15th Avenue Northeast from East Pacific Street to approximately 158 feet south of East Northlake Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80288, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
